channel.title: Mojave update makes funky knob response
channel.description:
Hi
I updated my mac recently to mojave and now the knobs in Axoloti became Exxxtremely sensitive when I move them with the mouse. Still works up n down but 1 milimeter movement with the mouse makes 3/4 of the range in a knob so this is pretty annoying... I guess this might be an issue between the operative system and maybe Java but I wondered if any of you might know a workaround... greetings S

item.title: Mojave update makes funky knob response
item.dc:creator: @surething
item.description:
@surething wrote:

Has anyone found a fix to this?

EDIT: Found a fix. In the Axoloti patcher software go to File -> Preferences and check the box 'Do not re-center cursor (for touchscreens)'.
